profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2019-08-11 22:01:58 -0400.

change.item: EAD was imported spring 2019 as part of the ArchivesSpace Phase II migration.

physdesc.extent: 351 record cartons 15 document boxes and 4 flat boxes

did.langmaterial: Material is in English and in French, with some materials in Dutch.
did.abstract: This collection is made up of architectural drawings.
This collection is also made up of architectural photographs.

bioghist.head: Biographical note
bioghist.p: Siegfried Loraine Sassoon, CBE, MC was an English poet, writer, and soldier.

bioghist.head: Biographical note
bioghist.p: Decorated for bravery on the Western Front.

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: Other collections of Rockwell Kent materials are at: SUNY-Plattsburgh (Rockwell Kent Collection).

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: This is the collection-level record for which 700 associated project-level records were created.
